statements: SELECT * FROM influencers;
SELECT name, followers_count FROM influencers;
SELECT id, name, followers_count FROM influencers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, followers_count FROM influencers WHERE followers_count > 10000;
SELECT id, name, engagement_rate FROM influencers ORDER BY engagement_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM influencers WHERE followers_count > 1000 ORDER BY engagement_rate DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT name, followers_count FROM influencers WHERE engagement_rate > 0.05 ORDER BY followers_count ASC;
SELECT id, name, engagement_rate FROM influencers WHERE followers_count BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT name, followers_count, engagement_rate FROM influencers WHERE name LIKE '%John%' OR name LIKE '%Emily%';
SELECT * FROM influencers WHERE followers_count > 500 AND engagement_rate < 0.1 ORDER BY name ASC, followers_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM BrandInfluencers;
SELECT influencer_id, engagement_metric FROM BrandInfluencers WHERE brand_id = 1;
SELECT influencer_name, follower_count FROM InfluencerDetails WHERE follower_count > 10000;
SELECT influencer_name, collaboration_date FROM InfluencerDetails INNER JOIN BrandInfluencers ON InfluencerDetails.influencer_id = BrandInfluencers.influencer_id;
SELECT influencer_id, category FROM InfluencerDetails WHERE category = 'Fashion';
SELECT influencer_name, follower_count FROM InfluencerDetails
SELECT * FROM BrandInfluencers ORDER BY engagement_metric DESC
SELECT influencer_name, follower_count, category FROM InfluencerDetails WHERE follower_count > 10000
SELECT brand_id, influencer_id, collaboration_date FROM BrandInfluencers WHERE brand_id = 3
SELECT brand_id, influencer_id, engagement_metric, collaboration_date FROM BrandInfluencers JOIN InfluencerDetails ON BrandInfluencers.influencer_id = InfluencerDetails.influencer_id
SELECT * FROM influencers WHERE influencer_id = 1;
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count FROM influencers WHERE engagement_rate > 2.5;
SELECT brand_name, industry FROM brand WHERE industry = 'Fashion' ORDER BY brand_name DESC;
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count, engagement_rate FROM influencers WHERE followers_count > 10000 AND engagement_rate < 5;

SELECT brand_name, influencer_name, collaboration_date FROM brand b INNER JOIN collaboration c ON b.brand_id = c.brand_id INNER JOIN influencers i ON c.influencer_id = i.influencer_id ORDER BY collaboration_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM influencers
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count FROM influencers WHERE engagement_rate > 0.05
SELECT brand_name, industry FROM brand WHERE brand_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT collaboration_id, collaboration_date, engagement_metrics FROM collaboration ORDER BY collaboration_date DESC

SELECT brand.brand_name, influencers.influencer_name, collaboration.collaboration_date FROM brand JOIN collaboration ON brand.brand_id = collaboration.brand_id JOIN influencers ON influencers.influencer_id = collaboration.influencer_id WHERE brand.industry = 'Fashion'
SELECT influencer_id, influencer_name, followers_count, engagement_rate FROM Influencers;
SELECT brand_id, brand_name, industry, revenue FROM Brands;
SELECT collaboration_id, brand_id, influencer_id, collaboration_date, payment_amount FROM Collaborations;
SELECT metric_id, collaboration_id, engagement_score, likes_count, comments_count FROM EngagementMetrics;
SELECT * FROM Influencers;
SELECT * FROM Influencers;
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count FROM Influencers ORDER BY followers_count DESC;
SELECT brand_name, industry FROM Brands WHERE revenue > 1000000;
SELECT influencer_name, engagement_rate FROM Influencers INNER JOIN Collaborations ON Influencers.influencer_id = Collaborations.influencer_id;
SELECT brand_name, payment_amount FROM Brands INNER JOIN Collaborations ON Brands.brand_id = Collaborations.brand_id WHERE payment_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM influencers;
SELECT id, name, followers FROM influencers ORDER BY followers DESC;
SELECT * FROM collaborations WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-03-31';
SELECT brand_id, COUNT(influencer_id) AS total_influencers FROM collaborations GROUP BY brand_id;
SELECT MAX(likes) AS max_likes, MIN(likes) AS min_likes FROM posts;
SELECT * FROM influencers WHERE followers > 5000;
SELECT name, followers FROM influencers WHERE engagement_rate > 5.5 ORDER BY followers DESC;
SELECT posts.post_date, engagements.engagement_type, engagements.engagement_count FROM posts JOIN engagements ON posts.id = engagements.post_id;
SELECT brands.name, collaborations.start_date, collaborations.end_date FROM brands JOIN collaborations ON brands.id = collaborations.brand_id;

SELECT influencers.name, collaborations.start_date, collaborations.end_date FROM influencers JOIN collaborations ON influencers.id = collaborations.influencer_id WHERE influencers.followers > 10000 ORDER BY collaborations.start_date DESC;
